description.raw:
This PRs implements the support for colcon \+ vcpkg in our CI scripts. The first example implemented here is ign-physics:

* DSL: there are limitations about length in paths on Windows batch so the names should be as small as possible \(this needs to be migrated to powershell or other alternative at some point\).

Test run in DSL:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/\_dsl\_ignition/556/

Tets run of physics:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ign_physics-ci-win&build=10)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_physics-ci-win/10/)** **https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/All/job/ign\_physics-ci-win/10/console

‌

‌
